english.segment1: All grown up with nowhere to go. How come nothing feels quite like home?. Sometimes it hurts to be awake. What's the plan when we've got no plan?. A costly piece of paper in hand. But that's not what it takes
english.segment2: Spirit, sing out a little louder. My flesh is so weak. But it screams with all its strength. Spirit grow up, into a flower. My flesh is like a weed. That strangles out the seed. And blocks out the sunlight
english.segment3: You could say we're living on prayer. Boomerangs that fly in the air. We're back where we started from
english.segment4: Spirit, sing out a little louder. My flesh is so weak. But it screams with all its strength. Spirit grow up, into a flower. My flesh is like a weed. That strangles out the seed. And blocks out the sunlight
english.segment5: Don't we need something, need something to live for? It's You. Don't we all need something, need something we'd die for? It's You. That's all I know to do, so please
english.segment6: Spirit, sing out a little louder. My flesh is so weak. But it screams with all its strength. Spirit grow up, into a flower. My flesh is like a weed. That strangles out the seed. And blocks out the sunlight
